name: Crexendo
overview: Crexendo provides a business optimization suite of cloud-based services including ecommerce, web marketing and cloud communication services for home office, small business and medium size companies. Headquartered in Tempe, Arizona, the company sells their web services using a SaaS model to help users build a successful Internet presence to sell products or services or ideas, accept online orders, analyze marketing performance, and manage pricing and customers. Their professional web services for small or medium size businesses, work to broaden businessâ€™ online reach to target audiences with marketing strategies including: SEO, conversion rate optimization, link building, social networking, web design, web hosting and web analytics. The company recently launched a cloud communication solution to complement its other web and ecommerce services.
